sentence: United-Guardian, Inc. ( UG ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 28, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.48 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 13, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased UG stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -4% decrease from the prior quarter.
The previous trading day's last sale of UG was $34.27, representing a -2.78% decrease from the 52 week high of $35.25 and a 46.14% increase over the 52 week low of $23.45.
UG is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
UG's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $1.23.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UG Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
